forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 68. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 94. Heat index values as high as 95. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours gently unfold across Boston, a serene hush wraps the city in a cloak of warmth and calm. With overnight temperatures lingering at a comfortable 68 degrees, the sky reveals only a handful of stars, suggesting an end to talk of lingering fog or clouds; instead, expect a canvas of deep blues before the sun casts its vibrant brush upon the day. The gentle whisper of the southwest wind, barely more than a sigh, promises a tranquil morning that gives way to the heat of midday.

As the sun ascends, it will usher in a radiant display, painting the world in hues of gold and warmth. By afternoon, temperatures will soar close to 94 degrees, nudged along by the soft caress of the same light breeze. The heat index may flirt with 95, urging all who venture outdoors to consider their attire wisely. Lightweight fabrics and light colors will offer comfort amid the rising mercury, while a wide-brimmed hat could serve as a refuge from the sun’s ardent embrace. 

This is a day to invite gentle strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a leisurely visit to one of the city's shaded parks, where the rustle of leaves offers a soundtrack to the lazy warmth. Whether one chooses to sip iced tea at a café or take a moment on a bench to observe the ballet of life around, the day calls for a leisurely pace, embracing the quintessential joys of summer in the city.
